mapper.sql: CITYNAME, ZB24FZ, ZB24FM, ZB24, ZB25FZ, ZB25FM, ZB25, ZB26FZ, ZB26FM, ZB26, ZB27FZ, ZB27FM, ZB27, ST1, SUMS, ZB30, TIMEDATE, CREATETIME
mapper.select: select total.cityname, total.zb24fz,total.zb24fm, nvl(round(total.zb24fz/nullif(total.zb24fm,0),2),0) zb24, total.zb25fz,total.zb25fm, nvl(round(total.zb25fz/nullif(total.zb25fm,0),2),0) zb25, total.zb26fz,total.zb26fm, nvl(round(total.zb26fz /nullif(total.zb26fm,0),2),0) zb26, total.zb27fz,total.zb27fm, nvl(round(total.zb27fz /nullif(total.zb27fm,0),2),0) zb27, total.st1,total.sums, nvl(round(total.st1/nullif(total.sums,0),2),0) zb30 from (select cityname, sum(zb24) zb24, sum(zb25) zb25, sum(zb26) zb26, sum(zb27) zb27, nvl(sum(zb30),0) zb30, sum(zb27fz) zb27fz, sum(zb27fm) zb27fm, sum(zb26fz) zb26fz, sum(zb26fm) zb26fm, sum(zb25fz) zb25fz, sum(zb25fm) zb25fm, sum(zb24fz) zb24fz, sum(zb24fm) zb24fm, nvl(sum(st1),0) st1, sum(sums) sums from u_smart_report_clsc ${ew.customSqlSegment} group by cityname ) total ORDER BY decode(cityname, '全省', 15, '长沙', 1, '株洲', 3, '湘潭', 2, '衡阳', 4, '郴州', 5, '常德', 6, '益阳', 7, '娄底', 8, '邵阳', 9, '岳阳', 10, '自治州', 11, '张家界', 12, '怀化', 13, '永州', 14)
